message: Hey, I was wondering whether there were any plans for ep.io to support CouchDB in the future.
Nothing concrete; MongoDB is the next on our list, as it seems to be a lot more popular.
When you say "next on our list," is there a timeframe attached to that?

@leafstorm There's a relative timeframe (i.e. "after the upcoming hardware move and payments are enabled"), but I can't give you a proper, date-based one for that. I'd say around two months is a good guess.
Okay then. If there was substantial interest in using CouchDB on your platform, would you add it to the list for sometime after MongoDB?

@leafstorm Of course, but it would need to be substantial interest - we need to make sure we can properly maintain all the databases we run, and from where I'm sitting, CouchDB usage has been getting smaller and smaller over the past two years or so.
This seems to indicate that interest in CouchDB has plateaued over the past two years, rather than actually dropping off: http://www.google.com/trends?q=couchdb
